definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: In circumstance of, if have what matter confuse, be a then it possible to be life it loses.
sentences.chinese: 万一，要是有什么事打搅了，那便可能是性命之失。

sentences.english: Money mother hope xu fei don't bother to mention.
sentences.chinese: 钱母希望许飞不要再来打搅多多。

sentences.english: When he is feeding his face the hates being bothered.
sentences.chinese: 他吃饭时，最讨厌别人打搅他。

sentences.english: He evidently wished no repetition of my intrusion.
sentences.chinese: 而他显然并不愿我再来打搅。

sentences.english: Excuse meand would you tell me where I can get some ender?
sentences.chinese: 打搅一下，您能通知我黄油在哪儿卖吗？

sentences.english: During the fifty-four years that I have inhabited this planet, I.
sentences.chinese: 我住在这个星球上五十四年以来，只被打搅过三次。

sentences.english: He's not breaking any laws, except maybe disturbing the peace.
sentences.chinese: 他并没违背任何法律，除了或许他打搅了社区的宁静。

sentences.english: The ringing didn't disturb Mary Jane, who was asleep on the couch, face down.
sentences.chinese: 铃声并没有打搅玛丽简，她面朝下在沙发上睡着了。

sentences.english: Don't bother me, I'm taking notes.
sentences.chinese: 别打搅我，人家在记笔记呢。

sentences.english: Excuse me- would you tell me where I can get some remainhinder?
sentences.chinese: 打搅一下，您能通知我黄油在哪儿卖吗？

sentences.english: I do hope that we can share some good things if I don't disturb you.
sentences.chinese: 如果不打搅大家，希望能经常贴点东西来共享。

sentences.english: I was Very discreet and didn't disturb you, just to see when you'd speak to me.
sentences.chinese: 我知趣得很，决不打搅你，看你什么时候跟我说话。

sentences.english: We felt it best not to disturb them any further.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定最好别去打搅他们。

sentences.english: This developer would be disturbed for an entire sprint.
sentences.chinese: 这个开发人员在整个sprint中都可以被人打搅。

sentences.english: He could do nothing to disturb them.
sentences.chinese: 他做什么都打搅不了她们。

sentences.english: Excuse me. I'm an accountant from Zhonglian Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 打搅一下，我是中联公司的会计。

definition: I beg to disturb you/I trespass on your hospitality/Thank you for your hospitality!
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
talkative/to speak out of turn/to blab/to shoot one's mouth off/rumors fly
to disturb/to look for trouble/to stir up a row/to bother sb intentionally
to have a rest/to stay for the night/to go to bed/to sleep
to inconvenience/to trouble (sb with a request)
